Package com.killian

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    Models a simple solid sphere.
    Billiard
    Billiard class to represent a billiard ball.
    Cue
    Cue class to represent the cue in the game of pool.
    GameArena
    This class provides a simple window in which grahical objects can be drawn.
    Line
    Models a simple line.
    Player
    Player class to represent the user(s) playing the game.
    Pool
    Pool class that represents the game of 8 Ball Pool using Standard British rule.
    Projection
    Class to represent a projection line.
    Rectangle
    Models a simple, solid rectangle.
    State
    State class to represent the current state of the game.
    Text
    Models a simple piece of text.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colour
    Colour Enum to represent colours of both players and balls.
    Stage
    Enum object to handle which stage of the game is currently in place.
